full_summary:
### Solicitation for Right Click Tools or Equivalent 
#### Government of Canada

[ numero ref:** SSC-24-00028296:T][numeroéroperation:** BPM022557/28296 ]

 #[amendment 0 applied][Date: 2024-11-13][Expiry Date:2024-11-29 14:00:00]

**Description**
The Government of Canada invites responses to the procurement for the purchase of Right Click Tools or equivalent for Global Affairs Canada (GAC).

Respondents can register and access the tender through the Shared Services Canada's Portal to View, Submit and Manage Offers (P2P) portal. Registration is mandatory and allows bidders to view, access, and submit solicitations to Global Affairs Canada, among other services.

For more information, kindly visit the P2P registration portal at: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

**Key Information**
-	# Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
- Quinn Address Line: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K0A 0C3, Canada
- Phone Number: 343-576-9329

**Note**
Right Click Tools shall be used to develop equivalent software functionality.

**G/BRIEFS**
\# Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
